metadata.description: Specifies the Azure location where the key vault should be created.

properties.arguments: [concat('-createPurviewAccountFunctionTriggerUrl', ' ', concat('\"', variables('createPurviewAccountFunctionTriggerUrl'), '\"'), ' ', '-userAzureLoginId', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('userAzureLoginId'), '\"'), ' ', '-tenantId', ' ', concat('\"', variables('tenantId'), '\"'), ' ', '-subscriptionId', ' ', concat('\"', variables('subscriptionId'), '\"'), ' ', '-userAzureLoginPassword', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('userAzureLoginPassword'), '\"'), ' ', '-resourceGroup', ' ', concat('\"', variables('resourceGroup'), '\"'), ' ', '-purviewAccountName', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('purviewAccountName'), '\"'), ' ', '-aadAppClientId', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('aadAppClientId'), '\"'), ' ', '-keyVaultName', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('keyVaultName'), '\"'))]
properties.scriptContent:
param([string] $createPurviewAccountFunctionTriggerUrl = $createPurviewAccountFunctionTriggerUrl, [string] $userAzureLoginId = $userAzureLoginId, [string] $tenantId = $tenantId, [string] $userAzureLoginPassword = $userAzureLoginPassword, [string] $resourceGroup = $resourceGroup, [string] $purviewAccountName = $purviewAccountName, [string] $aadAppClientId = $aadAppClientId, [string] $subscriptionId = $subscriptionId, [string] $keyVaultName = $keyVaultName)
Invoke-WebRequest $createPurviewAccountFunctionTriggerUrl -UseBasicParsing
Install-Module -Name "Az.Accounts" -Force
Install-Module -Name "Az.Resources" -Force
$PWord = ConvertTo-SecureString -String $userAzureLoginPassword -AsPlainText -Force
$User = $userAzureLoginId
$Credential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $User, $PWord
Connect-AzAccount -Credential $Credential
$resource_purview = "https://management.azure.com/"
$client_id = $aadAppClientId
$client_secret = Get-AzKeyVaultSecret -VaultName $keyVaultName -Name "aadAppClientSecret" -AsPlainText
$body = "grant_type=client_credentials&client_id=$client_id&client_secret=$client_secret&resource=$resource_purview"
$tenant_id = $tenantId
$token_purview = $(Invoke-WebRequest "https://login.microsoftonline.com/$tenant_id/oauth2/token" -Method 'POST' -Body $body -UseBasicParsing | ConvertFrom-Json).access_token
echo $token_purview
$headers = New-Object "System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary[[String],[String]]"
$headers.Add("Authorization", "Bearer $token_purview")
$purview_url = "https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/$($subscriptionId)/resourceGroups/$($resourceGroup)/providers/Microsoft.Purview/accounts/$($purviewAccountName)?api-version=2020-12-01-preview"
$response = $(Invoke-WebRequest $purview_url -Method Get -Headers $headers -UseBasicParsing | ConvertFrom-Json).properties.provisioningState
while( $(Invoke-WebRequest $purview_url -Method Get -Headers $headers -UseBasicParsing | ConvertFrom-Json).properties.provisioningState -ne "Succeeded") {
$response = $(Invoke-WebRequest $purview_url -Method Get -Headers $headers -UseBasicParsing | ConvertFrom-Json).properties.provisioningState
Start-Sleep -s 15
}
$resource_glossary = "https://purview.azure.net/"
$headers = New-Object "System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary[[String],[String]]"
$headers.Add("Content-Type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
$body = "grant_type=client_credentials&client_id=$client_id&client_secret=$client_secret&resource=$resource_glossary"
$token_glossary = $(Invoke-WebRequest "https://login.microsoftonline.com/$tenant_id/oauth2/token" -Method 'POST' -Headers $headers -Body $body -UseBasicParsing | ConvertFrom-Json).access_token
echo $token_glossary
$headers = New-Object "System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary[[String],[String]]"
$headers.Add("Authorization", "Bearer $token_glossary")
$purview_account_endpoint = "https://$($purviewAccountName).purview.azure.com"
while( $(Invoke-WebRequest "$purview_account_endpoint/catalog/api/atlas/v2/glossary" -Method 'GET' -Headers $headers -UseBasicParsing | ConvertFrom-Json).guid -eq "") {
$guid = $(Invoke-WebRequest "$purview_account_endpoint/catalog/api/atlas/v2/glossary" -Method 'GET' -Headers $headers -UseBasicParsing | ConvertFrom-Json).guid
Start-Sleep -s 15
}
